channel.title: Win Federal Contracts
channel.description: This show gives listeners a straightforward approach to selling to the federal government whether you are new or experienced in the marketplace. Insider information that can help you win lucrative federal contracts right now. You can have the edge over thousands of other small businesses trying desperately to get their share of the federal business. Federal contracting made easy in simplified steps- What you need to Know, What you need to Do, and Who you need to Call to win federal small business contracts.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2005 Robert Moment. All Rights Reserved.
channel.itunes:author: Robert Moment
channel.itunes:summary: Federal contracting made easy in simplified steps- What you need to Know, What you need to Do, and Who you need to Call to win federal small business contracts.
channel.itunes:subtitle: This show gives listeners a straightforward approach to selling to the federal government whether you are new or experienced in the marketplace.

item.title: Identifying Subcontracting Opportunities
item.description: All federal contracts over $500,000 for supplies, equipment, and services and all contracts over $1,000,000 for construction must have a subcontracting plan. This plan includes small businesses, women-owned businesses, veteran-owned, service-disabled.
item.itunes:author: Robert Moment
item.itunes:summary: All federal contracts over $500,000 for supplies, equipment, and services and all contracts over $1,000,000 for construction must have a subcontracting plan. This plan includes small businesses, women-owned businesses, veteran-owned, service-disabled.

item.title: Selling to Government Credit Card Buyers
item.description: Industry analyst estimate that 800,000 federal credit cardholders spend over 18 billion dollars each year on products and services. This is an untapped and hidden federal marketplace for small business owners.
item.itunes:author: Robert Moment
item.itunes:summary: Industry analyst estimate that 800,000 federal credit cardholders spend over 18 billion dollars each year on products and services. This is an untapped and hidden federal marketplace for small business owners.

item.title: Federal Small Business Programs
item.description: Do your small business qualify for Federal Small Business Programs ? Leverage the federal contracting advantages as a small business owners if you qualify for a program. Your small business could be missing out on winning lucrative federal contracts.
item.itunes:author: Robert Moment
item.itunes:summary: Do your small business qualify for Federal Small Business Programs ? Leverage the federal contracting advantages as a small business owners if you qualify for a program. Your small business could be missing out on winning lucrative federal contracts.
